item.title: Talk Announcement: Learning Enhanced Ensemble Filters at SOCAMS 2025
item.description:
Table of Contents
  • Overview
  • Talk Details
  • Venue & Schedule
  • Additional Information

Overview

I’m delighted to share that my abstract for a contributed talk has been accepted at the Southern California Applied Mathematics Symposium (SOCAMS) 2025. SOCAMS brings together researchers and students in applied mathematics for a day of talks, posters, and networking at UC Riverside.

Talk Details

  • Title: Learning Enhanced Ensemble Filters
  • Presenter: Bohan Chen
  • Time Slot: 16:15–16:35 on Saturday, April 26, 2025
  • Duration: 20 minutes (≈15 min talk + 5 min Q&A/transition)
  • Format:
    • Please connect via your own laptop (VGA or HDMI).
    • Bring any necessary adapters; only a limited supply will be provided.
    • As backup, you may bring a USB drive with your slides, though projector access is prioritized for laptop connections.

Venue & Schedule

  • Date: Saturday, April 26, 2025
  • Registration: Begins at 8 AM
  • Event Start: 8:30 AM
  • Symposium End: By 6:30 PM
  • Location: UC Riverside campus, centered around the Student Success Center and the Rivera (Library) Walkway
  • Full Schedule:
  • Venue Map:

Additional Information

  • Event Main Page:
  • FAQs:
  • Parking Details: Will be sent in a separate confirmation email
  • Contact: For any questions or concerns, please email the organizing committee at

We look forward to seeing everyone on April 26, and to engaging discussions around the latest developments in applied mathematics!
